description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using LightningJS framework. It includes a component with a template of animated circles used for a loading indicator, with reactive properties, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animation control.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a loading spinner with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval to toggle the alpha transparency of circles for fade-in/fade-out animation.
